title: Recommending kind LoL-Streamer

embed.title: ArashiLoL - Mixer
embed.description: Hello Guys, im new to Mixer and i hope to build up a lovely community together with you guys :D You can donate here! Feel free to do it.. or not.. i can't force you. Name: Arash Age: 21 Elo: Diamond I'm studying Media-science right now and im streaming for fun!

body: Just watching a very kind and relaxing LoL-Streamer. He seems like a good player, explains while playing and isn't toxic. He is still very small. Give it a go and join the stream!

replies.body: Thank you for sharing the stream, i really appreciate it! :p
